title: Investigate async hook performance cost in Lodestar

labels.name: prio-high
labels.description: Resolve issues as soon as possible.

labels.name: scope-performance
labels.description: Performance issue and ideas to improve performance.

body: **Describe the bug** Async hook takes a lot of time in a lodestar node subscribing to all subnets: - registerDestroyHook: 7.16% - init: 4.79% - destroy: 1.6% **Expected behavior** - Investigate why the node takes a lot of time for it - How to avoid it [0614-subscribeAllSubnets-contabo-20.cpuprofile.zip](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/files/8898286/0614-subscribeAllSubnets-contabo-20.cpuprofile.zip)

I checked which dependencies and source imports async_hooks

```
$ grep -ronw '/usr/src/lodestar' --include='*.js' -e 'async_hooks'
/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/eslint-plugin-node/lib/rules/no-unsupported-features/node-builtins.js:38:async_hooks

Of that, production code is only:

```
/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/eventsource/example/eventsource-polyfill.js:9709:async_hooks
/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/esm/esm/loader.js:1:async_hooks

-----

One by one:

- `/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/eventsource/example/eventsource-polyfill.js`: only used in a comment
```
    // implications (stack, `uncaughtException`, `async_hooks`)
```
- `/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/esm/esm/loader.js`: Part of a minimized bundle, not sure what does it do?
```
t.addBuiltinModules=(function(e){var t=["assert","async_hooks","buffer","child_process","cluster","crypto","dgram","dns","domain","events","fs","http","http2","https","net","os","path","perf_hooks","punycode","querystring","readline","repl","stream","string_decoder","tls","tty","url","util","v8","vm","zlib"]
```
- `/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/wtfnode/index.js`: Actually used, to be removed with https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/pull/4156

- `/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/util/util.js` + `/usr/src/lodestar/packages/cli/node_modules/util/util.js`: only used in a comment
```
    // implications (stack, `uncaughtException`, `async_hooks`)
```
